abstract: The “iPad shock” — that a foreign company has bested Japanese companies — is causing Japanese to consider whether they have lost their edge.
snippet: The “iPad shock” — that a foreign company has bested Japanese companies — is causing Japanese to consider whether they have lost their edge.
lead_paragraph: 7:05 a.m. | Updated With contributions from Tanaya Macheel in Paris.

headline.main: IPad’s Arrival in Tokyo Causes Japanese to Reflect
